title: Cofense Triage - Insights
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of Cofense Triage Reports and Threat Indicator.

definition.content:
[Cofense Triage](https://cofense.com/pdr-platform) is a powerful phishing threat detection and response platform designed to analyze and prioritize email threat indicators and incident reports efficiently.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of phishing reports and threat indicators.

For more information, see the [Cofense Triage Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cofense_triage/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates **Cofense Triage** events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
